name: Parkour Game 2
description:
Parkour Game 2 is an epic fun platform game where you have to parkour your way to the finish line. In Parkour Game 2 you can wall run and reach the finish line faster than anyone else. Parkour game 2 has different cool worlds where you can parkour.
Parkour Game 2 courses are challenging and time-consuming, but remember that if you fall, you have to start over the whole course. You have to parkour as well as you can to get to the finish line as fast as possible. Become the best parkourer in the world by beating this game as fast as possible
REMEMBER DONT FALL OF THE PLATFORMS!


CONTROLS:
W=Forward
S=Backward
A=Left
D=Right
Space=Jump
Shift=Dash
